UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_NICKNAME = ? , MEMBER_NAME = ? , EMAIL = ? , PHONE = ? , BIRTH = ? , GENDER = ? , ADDRESS1 = ? , ADDRESS2 = ? WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NICKNAME = ?
